title: Kidou Senshi Gundam - MS Senki Reboot
description:
Frederik Brown is a Mobile Suit trainee in one of Zeon's military schools, but always had a hard time keeping up with everyone. Ten months after training hard, he's thrust into actual combat for the first time together with Zeon's declaration of war. He becomes witness to the horrors and atrocities associated with war first hand as he fights to stay alive.

A new work by realist Kazuhisa Kondo! A reboot of the famous [url=https://mangadex.org/title/33899]Record of Mobile Suit Wars[/url] for the first time in almost twenty years!! 
Now, the whole story to the Earth Drop Operation is illustrated! What will the Zeon’s next move be?!
